meanings: anxiety, care, worry, solicitude, 노심하다 be anxious, be worried[troubled], worry oneself, exert one's mind, rack one's brains

examples.korean: Now they are even dealing with a nuclear meltdown. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이제 핵 원자로 노심 용융 문제까지 발생하고 있어. Neungyule
examples.english: Now they are even dealing with a nuclear meltdown. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There was a partial melting of a fuel rod, but it was nothing like a whole reactor melting down,' said Japan's ambassador to the United States Ichiro Fujisaki. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 연료봉이 부분적으로 녹아내렸다. 일부분이 녹긴 했으나 전체적인 노심 용해하고는 거리가 멀다.' 라고 후지사키 이치로 주미 일본 대사가 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: There was a partial melting of a fuel rod, but it was nothing like a whole reactor melting down,' said Japan's ambassador to the United States Ichiro Fujisaki. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: With thousands dead and missing due to the earthquake and tsunami in Japan, the added danger and fear of a meltdown at the Fukushima nuclear power plant has the rest of the world concerned. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 일본에서 대지진과 지진 해일로 수 천명이 죽거나 실종된 데다가, 후쿠시마 원전의 노심이 녹는 위험한 상황까지 겹치면서 전 세계 다른 나라들의 우려를 낳았다. Neungyule
examples.english: With thousands dead and missing due to the earthquake and tsunami in Japan, the added danger and fear of a meltdown at the Fukushima nuclear power plant has the rest of the world concerned. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I want you to muck up the reactor core. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네가 원자로 노심을 혼란시키기 바란다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 ENO(naja****)
examples.english: I want you to muck up the reactor core. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It's all smoke and mirrors - and part of the reason for the meltdown in the first place. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 최초 원자로 노심 용융사고의 원인의 일부는 교묘한 속임수때문이었다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 einky(eink****)
examples.english: It's all smoke and mirrors - and part of the reason for the meltdown in the first place. Add to Wordbook
